name: Message From Scopuli IV
description:
You are stranded on Scopuli IV, a mysterious planet with a tumultuous atmosphere that would surely cause even the most seasoned space Captain's to crash. You will use this to your advantage, enticing ships in with photos of many treasures of this land and using the pieces from their inevitable wrecks to escape the planet.

LMB to interact/pickup/upload to your ship.

RMB to take photos.

1-4 to select which photo to overwrite.
